summary: An individual's inability to verbally express emotions leads to a reliance on actions to communicate feelings, creating a silent struggle within."
When verbal expression fails, consistent caring actions can serve as a powerful means of conveying emotions and intentions."
Actions intended to express deeper feelings can be misinterpreted by others, leading to a misunderstanding of the true nature of a relationship."
Keeping emotions hidden can result in an internal conflict, as feelings intensify without resolution or acknowledgment."
